page.title: List of sovereign states and dependent territories in the Indian Ocean

revisions.rev:
{{Unreferenced|date=September 2009}} This is a '''list of countries and territories in the Indian Ocean''':
==Countries== *{{flagicon|Comoros}} [[Comoros]] *{{flagicon|Madagascar}} [[Madagascar]] *{{flagicon|Maldives}} [[Maldives]] *{{flagicon|Mauritius}} [[Mauritius]] *{{flagicon|Seychelles}} [[Seychelles]] *{{flagicon|Sri Lanka}} [[Sri Lanka]] front range
